resources.string: Refuge de Montagne, Cirque de Gavarnie, Parc National des Pyrenees, France

The Espuguettes refuge is 2027m high. It\'s reachable after a 2 hours hike from Gavarnie village. We serve plates and sandwich during the day. In the evening dinner is served at 7pm. Our rooms have 5 to 10 beds each and we count a total of 54 beds. Bed sheets are supplied. Toilets and washbassin are available but no shower.
